name: Snadi Sweater
full_text: Tiniest sweater of them all! Want to show everyone your true knitter spirit by hanging a raglan sweater on your purse? Need to make a swatch in circle? Want cute tiny sweaters to decorate your Christmas tree? Know a Harry Potter fan? This project is for you! Yardage 10 grams of Regia Premium Merino Yak or any other fingering weight yarn Needles 2.25 - 2.50 mm Measurements Total height: 9 cm Bust circumference: 14 cm Sleeve length (from neckline): 9 cm You can use fingering weight yarn to achieve measurements mentioned or any other yarn and needles to make a gauge swatch. Ohje tulossa pian myös suomeksi.
